claudeCode.title: Claude Code Authentication
claudeCode.description: Claude Code requires authentication. You have two options:

subscription.title: Option 1: Claude Subscription (Recommended)
subscription.description: Use Claude Code with your existing Claude Pro, Max or Team subscription - no extra cost!
subscription.instructions: Open the terminal in your workspace and run the following command:

apiKey.title: Option 2: API Key
apiKey.description: Alternatively, you can use an Anthropic API key.
apiKey.costDetails: API usage is billed based on consumption. This can become expensive quickly with intensive Claude Code usage.
apiKey.hint: If you don't have a Claude subscription, you can save your API key here. The key is stored encrypted and automatically set as an environment variable when starting the workspace.

security.title: Security Note
security.description: Your API key is encrypted with AES-256-GCM and stored securely in the database. It is only set as an environment variable when starting the workspace container.

claude.setupDescription: To use Claude Code, sign in with your Claude Pro/Max subscription.
claude.codeInputLabel: After signing in, you will receive a code. Paste it here:
claude.authSuccessDesc: You are now signed in to Claude Code.

terminal.hint: Note: Only changes in /workspace are persisted!
